Record.Value: Borznac's Kitchen
Better get cooking

Borznac the 5th isn't known for his niceties. After being cut out of several trade deals with Sinotai, he's decided to build an empire of his own, by taking control of all nearby Lunar bases, including yours. You've been forced to work as his new personal chef. You still don't know what happened to his last chef, and you don't want to find out. He has quite the appetite, and is very impatient. So you better get cooking.

Borznac the 5th isn't known for his niceties. After being cut out of several trade deals with Sinotai, he's decided to build an empire of his own, by taking control of all nearby Lunar bases, including yours. You've been forced to work as his new personal chef. You still don't know what happened to his last chef, and you don't want to find out. He has quite the appetite, and is very impatient. So you better get cooking.
Cook for your life!
Cook and deliver 4 baked potatos.
Cook and deliver 2 packs of fries.
Bake and deliver 3 Muffins.
Cook and deliver 2 bread Loaves.
Manufacture and deliver 2 cartons of milk.
Bake and deliver 2 pumpkin pies.
Blend and deliver a can of tomato soup.
Blend and deliver a can of pumpkin soup.
Bake and deliver 2 baked potatos.
Bake and deliver 1 loaf of bread.
Fry and deliver 1 pack of fries.
Bake and deliver 1 pumpkin pie.
Bake and deliver 3 muffins.
Manufacture and deliver 2 cartons of milk.

I'm hungry and impatient so Don't disappoint me. My Last chef disappointed me and things didn't go down well for them. Now that you here let us start with something you're capable of. Make me some baked potatoes.
Agh, No. I want something with some FLAVOUR, I demand some fries.
That was good, Now I want something to sweat. Make me some muffins.
Ah, all that sweetness has put me in a doughy mood, I think some bread will go nicely.
All this food has made me a bit parched, I demand some fresh milk.
Ah now for dessert A pumpkin Pie sounds nice. Make me one of them. I've opened up the chute for you to use anything the last Chef left behind.

Very well done, unlike your Predecessor you have actually what it takes to survive in this harsh world, I might even consider letting you have your freedom back as a sign of goodwill. That's if you can complete the 3-course meal in time.
Close Narration Panel
